testsuite.name: JwtTokenProvider Tests

testcase.name: Generate token with empty claims should still work
Get subject should return correct subject
Generate token with null claims should still work
Generate token should create valid JWT
Is token expired should return false for fresh token
Get username should return null when username not in claims
Validate token should return true for valid token
Access token and refresh token should have different expirations
Validate token should return false for invalid token
Get expiration should return valid expiration date
Init should throw exception when secret is null
Get claims should return correct claims
Generate refresh token should create valid token
Get username should extract username from claims
Init should throw exception when secret is empty
Validate token should return false for malformed token
